click: function(e,p) { console.log(e);  var shareBox = $(document.createElement("div"));  shareBox.attr("id", "shareBox");  shareBox.attr("data-id", e.data.args[2].id);  shareBox.evently("share",$$(this).app); shareBox.trigger("glueForm",[e.data.args[2].id]);  shareBox.dialog({resizable: false, width: "600px", modal: true});}
